group_1.narration: She was always so kind and cheerful,@but now her eyes were red from crying.@I only had to look at her to know@that something had happened...
But I was just a kid.@She couldn't confide in me,@so all I could do was worry about her...
She was clearly down about something,@but was still as sweet to me as ever.@She looked after me that day, too.
Then, several days after that,@we heard really angry voices@coming from the hardware store@next door while we were all at our shop.

group_1.textRight: What do you mean?!
I said NO!!!
Oh no, are they fighting? I wonder what@happened...

group_1.textLeft: (Maybe she was crying because she was having@a fight with her dad?)

group_1.textRight: Riko! I'm heâ€”
[chara:801000:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Whoa! Riko, what is it?

group_1.textLeft: Tell me! Tell me what happened!

group_1.textCenter: "I heard the fight you had the other night.@What happened with your dad?"
When I asked her that, she looked really@surprised.

group_1.narration: At first, she seemed really hesitant@to open up. But eventually, she told@me what happened.
She had a boyfriend,@and she wanted to marry him.
But he lived really far away,@and she'd go join him after they got married.
Her dad, worried about her moving so far,@opposed the marriage and they fought over it.

group_1.textCenter: All of it shocked me. Both the thought of her@marrying, and of her leaving.
It made me really sad, but...
When she talked about getting married,@she looked so happy.
It made me feel happy too, somehow.

group_1.textRight: *Sob*
S-sorry, I didn't mean to cry... *Sob*
I'm just so sad that my dad is against us@getting married.
I have someone I love so much...
But my dad, who I really love too, won't@accept him...
Unn...

group_1.textLeft: I'm sure your dad will accept him...

group_1.narration: This person who had always cared@for me and who I loved so much@was now hurting and full of anxiety.
Even though it made me really sad to think@about her going somewhere far away,@I wanted to support her marriage.
She'd looked after me all this time.@I wanted to do something@in return and help her.
I wanted to do more than just console@her and encourage her to be strong.@I wanted to solve her problem.
I just didn't know how I could.@That was when he appeared.

group_1.textRight: You seem to be worried about something.
My name is Kyubey.
I'm not a dog.
Do you want to help your friend, Riko Chiaki?

group_1.textLeft: And you know about her, too?

group_1.textRight: You have the power to help her.
You can solve her problem.
Of course. If you make a contract with me.
What do you want to do to help her?
What will you wish for, to achieve what you@want?

group_1.textLeft: I wish that her marriage will be accepted...
